postSQLs:['with final_table as (
    select
        'Podcast/Vodcast' as channel
        ,'Acast' as sub_channel
        , 'Changemakers' as content
          , date as date
        , datename(month, date) as month
        , concat(datename(month, date), ' ', year(date)) as month_year
        , concat(datename(month, date), ' ', year(date), ' Week ', (DATEPART(week, date) - DATEPART(week, DATEADD(day, 1, EOMONTH(date, -1)))) + 1) as week
        , datename(dw, date) as day_week
        , case when datename(dw, date) in ('Saturday', 'Sunday') then 'Weekend' else 'Weekday' end as week_type
        , 'Unspecified' as time_day
        , downloads as downloads_by_date
        , downloads as total_engagements
    from Raw_ACastDownloads
)

MERGE INTO Changemakers_Combined_Overview a
USING final_table b
    ON a.channel = b.channel
    and a.sub_channel = b.sub_channel
    and a.date = b.date 
WHEN MATCHED THEN
  UPDATE SET 
        a.downloads_by_date  = b.downloads_by_date 
        , a.total_engagements  = b.total_engagements 
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
  INSERT (channel, sub_channel, content, date,month,month_year,week,day_week,week_type,time_day, downloads_by_date, total_engagements)
  VALUES (
        b.channel
        , b.sub_channel
        , b.content
        , b.date 
        , b.month
        , b.month_year
        , b.week
        , b.day_week
        , b.week_type
        , b.time_day
        , b.downloads_by_date
        , b.total_engagements
        );'],
